song_lyrics: Hinḍoḷo Ghanshyām Harino, ati rūpāḷo lāge re;
Sajnī antar vādhe sukhḍu, bhavnu dukhḍu bhāge re... Hinḍoḷo° 1
Chhel chaturvar chhogāḷā kerī, mūrti manohar pyārī re;
Albelā man mohan upar, tan dhan nākhu vārī re... Hinḍoḷo° 2
Hinḍoḷānī shobhā helī, varṇavyāmā nav āve re;
Laṭkāḷā keru chhogalīyu, chittaḍāne lalchāve re... Hinḍoḷo° 3
Kanak stambh hinḍoḷo kāju, dorī resham kerī re;
Brahmānandno vahālo zule, lāl manohar laherī re... Hinḍoḷo° 4
title: Hinḍoḷo Ghanshyām Harino ati rūpāḷo lāge re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1004: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Utsavna Pad
